name: intgr-pmsvodka.yml
configuration:
spring:
  jpa:
    database: postgresql
    hibernate:
      ddl-auto: none
    database-platform: org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQL95Dialect
    properties:
        hibernate:
          temp:
            use_jdbc_metadata_defaults: false
  data:
    solr:
      user: "solr"
      pass: "SolrRocks"
      host: "http://10.28.97.89:8081/solr"
  datasource:
    url: "jdbc:postgresql://10.28.97.89/ttm_camunda?ApplicationName=nttm-intgr-pmsvodka"
    username: "postgres"
    password: "1"
    hikari:
      maximum-pool-size: 10
      minimum-idle: 5
      connection-test-query: select 1
      connection-timeout: 1000
  jmx:
    default-domain: pmsvodka-jmx
  proc-spk: Mrt_ImportTTM8
  proc-iptv: Mrt_ImportTTM16
  application:
    name: nttm-intgr-pmsvokda
app:
  jwt:
    expire: ${JWT_EXPIRE:90000000} #90000000ms = 25hrs
    secret: ${JWT_SECRET_KEY:z%C*F-JaNdRgUkXn2r5u8x/A?D(G+KbPeShVmYq3s6v9y&E)H@McQfTjWnZr4h}
    server: http://localhost:8080/nttm-auth-jwt/api/
server:
  port: 8091

cron: "0 0 * * * *"

nttm:
  prefix: "http://10.28.97.89:8080"
  auth:
    username: "pmsvodka_intgr"
    password: "7C5GYpdf4XfAbgZDmr8n"
  pmsvodkaUser: "bfdd6b5f-953a-4748-ac3d-e77fd68f690e"
  pmsvodka:
    url: jdbc:sqlserver://10.30.1.32:1433;database=MRTelecom
    username: CMS_user
    password: 1q2w3e4r
  task:
    type:
      autoCloseTaskTypeId: 27
management:
  endpoints:
    web:
      path-mapping:
        prometheus: metrics
      base-path: /
      exposure:
        include: prometheus
  health.solr.enabled: false
logging:
  config: classpath:log4j2-dev.yaml
  level:
    org.hibernate: error
    org.hibernate.SQL: error
    org.zalando.logbook: info
logbook:
  format:
    style: http
  exclude:
    - "**/metrics"
